title: Shoushimin Series 2nd Season

alternative_titles.en: Shoshimin: How to Become Ordinary Season 2
alternative_titles.ja: 小市民シリーズ 第2期

synopsis:
"I just wanted to know... what love really is."

Having ended their mutually beneficial reciprocal relationship, second-year high schoolers Jougorou Kobato and Yuki Osanai go their separate ways.

Osanai begins dating first-year newspaper club member Uriuno, who throws himself into covering a series of arson incidents happening around town in hopes of leaving a mark on the school and impressing Osanai. Meanwhile, Kobato starts a relationship with his classmate, Nakamaru, and settles into a peaceful daily life—until he happens to witness an arson scene by the riverside...

What awaits Kobato and Osanai as they embark on a new chapter of their lives as "ordinary citizens"?

(Source: Official website, translated)
